definition.de: Die Krankheiten, die die Psyche und das Verhalten betreffen
definition.dk: Sygdomme og lidelser, der påvirker sindet og adfærden.
definition.en-GB: The psychological well-being of an individual and the diseases and disorders that affect mood, thinking and behaviour as well as actions taken to bring improvement and awareness to these conditions
definition.en-US: The psychological well-being of an individual and the diseases and disorders that affect mood, thinking and behaviour as well as actions taken to bring improvement and awareness to these conditions
definition.pt-BR: Doenças e distúrbios que afetam a mente e o comportamento.
definition.pt-PT: Doenças e distúrbios que afetam a mente e o comportamento.
definition.se: Tillstånd av psykisk ohälsa som drabbar personligheten, känslolivet och kognitionen.
definition.zh-Hans: 影响精神和行为的疾病和失调
